shortDescription: Beautiful 3-bedroom Victorian house with modern extensions
longDescription: This stunning Victorian house has been carefully renovated to combine period features with contemporary living. The property boasts three generous bedrooms, a modern kitchen with integrated appliances, and a spacious living room with original fireplace. The rear garden is south-facing and beautifully landscaped.

shortDescription: Modern 2-bedroom flat in the heart of Camden
longDescription: Situated in a sought-after development, this contemporary flat offers excellent transport links and local amenities. The open-plan living area creates a bright and spacious feel, while both bedrooms are well-proportioned. Includes one allocated parking space and communal gardens.

shortDescription: Luxurious 5-bedroom townhouse in prime Westminster location
longDescription: An exceptional family home spread over four floors, this elegant townhouse combines classical architecture with high-end modern amenities. Features include a state-of-the-art kitchen, master suite with dressing room and ensuite, home office, and a private south-facing garden. Located moments from excellent schools and transport links.

shortDescription: Affordable 1-bedroom flat perfect for first-time buyers
longDescription: This well-maintained one-bedroom flat offers an ideal opportunity for first-time buyers or investors. The property features a good-sized bedroom, modern bathroom, and a combined living/kitchen area. Located close to Croydon town center with excellent shopping and transport connections.

shortDescription: Spacious 4-bedroom family home with large garden
longDescription: This impressive detached family home offers versatile accommodation arranged over two floors. Highlights include a large kitchen/breakfast room, separate dining room, conservatory, and four double bedrooms including master with ensuite. The property benefits from a substantial rear garden, driveway parking for multiple vehicles, and an integral garage.

A stylish apartment in the heart of East London's creative quarter. This modern flat features floor-to-ceiling windows, engineered oak flooring, and a sleek fitted kitchen. Both bedrooms are doubles, and the property includes private outdoor space. Perfect for professionals seeking a vibrant urban lifestyle.

A delightful terraced house offering excellent potential to extend (subject to planning). Currently configured with two bedrooms, a through lounge/diner, and a kitchen leading to the rear garden. The property retains many original features and is conveniently located for local schools, shops, and Lewisham station.
